name: electron-erp
description: Modern desktop ERP app (Electron + React + Vite + TS + Fluent UI)

scripts.dev:electron: cross-env ELECTRON=1 concurrently -n MAIN,PRELOAD,RENDERER,ELECTRON -c blue,magenta,green,yellow "tsup src/main/index.ts --out-dir dist/main --format cjs --sourcemap --watch --tsconfig tsconfig.main.json" "tsup src/preload/index.ts --out-dir dist/preload --format cjs --sourcemap --watch --tsconfig tsconfig.preload.json" "vite" "cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 wait-on tcp:5173 dist/main/index.js && electronmon ."
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsup src/main/index.ts --out-dir dist/main --format cjs --sourcemap --tsconfig tsconfig.main.json && tsup src/preload/index.ts --out-dir dist/preload --format cjs --sourcemap --tsconfig tsconfig.preload.json && vite build
scripts.build:mobile: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.build:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap open android
scripts.build:ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap open ios
scripts.android:dev: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run android
scripts.ios:dev: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios
